column3: Guy Van den Broeck@University of California

column1: This paper proposes a new classification model called logistic circuits. On MNIST and Fashion datasets
column2: our learning algorithm outperforms neural networks that have an order of magnitude more parameters. Yet
column3: logistic circuits have a distinct origin in symbolic AI
column4: forming a discriminative counterpart to probabilistic-logical circuits such as ACs
column6: and PSDDs. We show that parameter learning for logistic circuits is convex optimization
column7: and that a simple local search algorithm can induce strong model structures from data.
